edu.purdue.cs.encourse.service.impl

Class AccountServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.purdue.cs.encourse.service.impl.AccountServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountService

    @Service(value="AccountService")
public class AccountServiceImpl
extends Object
implements AccountService
    Contains implementations for all services pertaining to account operations. Primarily used for logging in with an account.
    Author:
    William Jordan Reed, reed226@purdue.edu

      Account retrieveAccount(String userName)
      The primary method for retrieving an account from database
      Account retrieveAccountByID(String userID)
      A secondary method for retrieving an account Only useful for backend code, frontend does not have access to userIDs
      CollegeAdmin retrieveAdmin(String userName)
      Retrieves an account as an administrator
      List<Account> retrieveAllAccounts()
      Retrieves all accounts currently in the database Used by administrators to see and manage accounts

      Retrieves an account as a professor
